message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $180. This exclusive item has been valued at $150 by you, and we believe this price reflects its unique quality and benefits. We're confident it will meet your expectations and provide excellent value for your investment.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product, which aligns closely with my valuation. If you can match this price, I would be delighted to make the purchase.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To ensure we reach an agreement that is mutually beneficial, I am willing to consider your offer. However, to maintain the integrity of our negotiation process, I propose a price of $165 for the product. This still allows us to gain a reasonable profit while acknowledging your perspective.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your revised proposal, I would like to counter with an offer of $150 for the product. I believe this aligns closely with both our interests and the value I place on the item.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I've considered your latest offer carefully. In order to move forward with a fair transaction, I am willing to sell the product for $155. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a compromise that respects both our positions.
